name: race_detail_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool greyhound_racing_uk.
Tool description: Greyhound Racing API - UK. In realtime! Daily races, race detail, historical data and more.
API description: **Get race detailed info by ID {id_race}.**

You can get the "id_race" from Results or Racecards endpoints

id_race.description: The unique identifier of the race to get details for.
